Package operations.sensors

Class SensorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • operations.sensors.SensorFactory
  • public class SensorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to create, and hold all Sensor objects.
    Author:
    Piotr Duzniak

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  SensorFactory.Type
      Enum for specifying type of sensor

      ConcurrentHashMap holding all sensors, having
      key1=SensorFactory.Type, key2=ID, value=Sensor
      static SensorFactory.Type[] typePrecedence
      Defines what is the order of types (SensorFactory.Type, and which should be used.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Return the number of sensors of given SensorFactory.Type

      Creates object basing on provided enum parameter.
      static Sensor[] getOrderedArray()
      Return a Sensor array, with properly ordered sensors to read data from AVR
      static int[] getOrderedQuantity()
      Returns array with int values, where each record holds quantity of sensors of
      given SensorFactory.Type as specified in typePrecedence.
      Values are properly ordered to send message to AVR.

      • getOrderedQuantity

        public static int[] getOrderedQuantity()
        Returns array with int values, where each record holds quantity of sensors of
        given SensorFactory.Type as specified in typePrecedence.
        Values are properly ordered to send message to AVR.
        Returns:

        Creates object basing on provided enum parameter.
        Tensometer/Encoder objects supported.
        Parameters:
